scene1.text: In my end is my beginning… That’s a quotation I’ve often heard people say. It sounds all right.
but what does it really mean?
Is there ever any particular spot where one can put one’s finger and say:
“It all began that day, at such a time and such a place, with such an incident?”
Did my story begin, when I noticed the Sale Bill hanging on city walls saying that  “The Towers”,are on auction?
the property was in its prime as it was seven or maybe 8 hundreds of years ago
maybe it was because as I child I had always dreamt of a house of mine
or maybe it was because of the silly agreement I have meade with Santoix, he would build a house for me
and I would bring “the love of my life” and I would live “happy ever afterwards” in that house with that girl.
I was a young fool longing for something I was never likely to have...

scene2.text: Maybe Santoix was trying to warn us when we first saw the mansion of Gipsy’s Acre.
NONE
Like it?
New character added. Santonix unlocked.
It’s the tops,”A silly thing to say but I think he knows what I mean.
Yes, it is the best thing I have done,It’s cost you a mint of money and it’s worth every penny of it.
Come on, Mike”. pick her up and carry her over the threshold.
That’s the thing to do when you enter into possession with your bride!
W..whatt!!
New character added. Ellie added to characters
(... I can feel my ears burning.)
(wish the threshold was a bit longer...)
“Be good to her, Mike. Take care of her. Don’t let harm come to her. She can’t take care of herself. She thinks she can.”
“Why should any harm happen to me?”
“Because it’s a bad world and there are bad people in it, they are everywhere around you”
“I’d look after you myself, child, if I could,” he said, “but I can’t. It won’t be long now. You’ll have to fend for yourself.”
Cut out the gipsy’s warning, Santonix, I have had enough of these. “and take us round the house. Every inch of it.”
Yeah, they won’t bother us, I have decided to live happily in this mention with Mike
Come on Santonix, you seriously believe in the Gypsy's Acre?
NONE
We know better than just to believe in common fairytales...
Up now, we have a whole mansion ahead of us.
(It might be my imagination but he looked dead serious for a second)

scene3.text: wow, this place is even better now that I’ve seen the inside, right Mike?
Yeah,.. That’s Santonix for you. He never fails to amaze his clients.
Too bad he had to leave too soon, he said he was feeling tired.
Honestly I don’t think he should be even up walking, he was so pale too. You said it was a blood disease right?
Yeah, he wanted this mansion to be his last...
Enought with depressing thoughts, this mention still doesnt have a name.
We’ll call it Gipsy’s Acre,“just to show! A kind of challenge, don’t you think?
It’s our Acre, and to hell with the gipsy’s warning.”
(I dont like that name though. )
(Makes me remember all the stupid rumors)
GOODNESS ELLIE ARE YOU ALRIGHT?
W-w, why? Why did anyone do it?
Mike... I am scared.
There dear, it is just a small cut from the wine glass.
Why us? I don’t understand.
There seems to be something written at the paper.
NONE
This  again?
Somebody is trying to drive us away, Mike. To drive us away from the house we’ve built, the house we love.
We won’t let them drive us away, I’ll take care of you. Nothing shall hurt you.
We’ve built on Gipsy’s Acre.We’ve done what the legend told us not to do.”
I will not let them get away with this!

Up now, we have a whole mansion ahead of us.
(It might be my imagination but he looked dead serious for a second)
